scripts.postinstall: node -e "if (process.platform !== 'win32') { require('child_process').execSync('cd build && make install && cd .. && chmod +x ./scripts/inform_update_paths.sh && ./scripts/inform_update_paths.sh', { stdio: 'inherit' }); }"
scripts.ctest: cmake-js -C --parallel 32 compile && cd build && make test
